- Ceiling vent register: rectangular metal grille with vertical blades; white enamel finish.
- Location: interior finished ceiling (likely living/hall area).
- Condition: blades intact; minor frame paint chipping; small gap between frame and drywall on the right.
- Fasteners: screws visible securing the frame (top and bottom).
- Maintenance: dust buildup possible behind blades; clean and consider sealing any gap to reduce air leakage.
